summary: Most core quiz functionality is implemented: Home/Quiz/Result screens with navigation, scoring with double-tap prevention, Next-to-Result flow, Airtable-backed loading via backend with a local fallback set, and mobile-friendly styling. However, the exact required score text format on the Result screen is not met, and Internet Identity support was added despite being a stated non-goal.

missing_requirements.requirement: Result screen displays the final score as the exact string "Your Score: X/Y" (with Y = total questions attempted).
missing_requirements.reason: Result screen shows a "Your Score" label and then renders "{score}/{totalQuestions}" separately, but not the exact combined string "Your Score: X/Y" as specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity integration hooks/provider (authentication/identity management) added to the frontend.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/login/Internet Identity integration as non-goals, but the diff introduces an InternetIdentityProvider and related hooks and uses it in app bootstrap.

hallucinated_features.description: Result screen includes performance messages with emojis (üéâ üëç üí™ üìö).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; user-facing text was requested to be English, and the spec only required displaying the score string and restart navigation.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest and adds additional UI/content beyond the three required screens.
